alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Carroll, southeastern Jo Daviess, southwestern Stephenson, northeastern Clinton and southeastern Jackson Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Massbach, or 13 miles northwest of Mount Carroll, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Savanna and Sabula around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mount Carroll, Lanark and Shannon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
